column1: I’m praying for members of our military serving overseas tonight. The nation stands behind you. God bless America and God bless our troops! 🇺🇸
Wishing you many blessings on this beautiful Christmas morning! May you find God’s peace today and throughout the new year. Merry Christmas everyone! 🎄
Happy Hanukkah and many blessings to my friends in the Jewish community!

The foundation of our republic is under attack.  The Constitution gives the right to due process yet the president was not afforded this fundamental right. “Witnesses” with no firsthand knowledge lack any evidence.  This impeachment goes against everything America stands for.
@Dean_Moriarty36 Thanks Dean!
@Joe32077 Thanks Joe!

I used to fix cars. When I got an engine up-and-running customers never asked me to change the motor back to the way it was before. Right now there are politicians threatening to do exactly that with our economy.  Join me in the fight for prosperity: https://t.co/M6yGABzhxC https://t.co/DpmjbjTkvl

Today I’m proud to announce my campaign for re-election as your representative in Congress.  As I’ve done since taking office I will work each day to help the people of Ohio.  I hope you’ll join me. Learn more at https://t.co/d8wOlK7WQ7  FULL RELEASE: https://t.co/RvSlZjFeo0 https://t.co/yNlKX2jUMT
Never a doubt. #Big10Champions https://t.co/D2eHwQnpXg https://t.co/Z0ZDVlGBHY
Let’s keep the momentum going Bucks! #GoBucks #OSUvsWISC #Big10Championship
Had a great time today at the Pataskala Christmas Cookie Walk. Ran into some old friends and made some new ones! More importantly got to spread some Christmas cheer! https://t.co/KEiGCSUSsn
Good luck to Coach Randy Baughman and the Licking Valley Panthers as they take on Clyde in the state football championship today! #ring4randy  https://t.co/qlxZrRGiob

Good luck to all of the Deer Hunters out there this morning and the rest of the week. It should be a wonderful week to enjoy the beautiful Ohio Outdoors. If you have any questions about regulations or rules while out there visit the link below. https://t.co/GVA0L5FGi6
This is what’s at stake next year. We can’t allow radicals like this to win. #LeadRight https://t.co/Q6Yhx20Xl5
@RandySpung I-O
My feelings on my commute back to DC this week after a more than excellent Buckeye win. #OSUvsMICH #GoBucks https://t.co/p558w4IM8y
Touchdown Buckeyes!!! #OSUvsMICH
I want to wish everyone a wonderful Thanksgiving. I am so incredibly thankful to be your congressman. I look forward to many more Thanksgivings together!
Rural banks are closing This is why I am in Congress-fighting to ensure financial success of all Americans.  https://t.co/V87bjeAQRF

I spent the evening with the @OSUCRs. It was so great to talk to them and to hear their insights and thoughts about our country. There are so many fantastic young leaders in this crowd. Looking forward to coming back! #OH12 https://t.co/naKg71zRSu
Great day to knock some doors in Dublin! Thank you so much to the @OSUCRs for all of your help today. Looking forward to the campaign season ahead! https://t.co/Mmklgbvd1m

For the day of Atonement Yom Kippur is an opportunity to look ahead for many blessings and glad tidings in the year ahead. I wish my friends in the Jewish Faith a meaningful Yom Kippur. #yomkippur2019 https://t.co/kfYvDgYYmq

I would like to wish all of my friends in the Jewish Community Shana Tova this evening as Rosh Hashanah is upon us! May we reflect on all of the wonderful gifts and accomplishments this year! #RoshHashanah https://t.co/mC6SMEiAOY
Register to Vote! #NationalVoterRegistrationDay https://t.co/KlO7oVxOjU

Today is #NationalVoterRegistrationDay Make sure you are registered for this November's Election and you exercise your right to vote. It is important for a fair and accountable government! If you need to update or register please visit https://t.co/yEvyMhNzrq today. Join me!
Team Troy was out today in Dublin to support our friend State Senator Stephanie Kunze! @StephanieKunze @Yost4Ohio https://t.co/Kjy1MPEBb6

Eighteen years ago the largest attack on American soil was carried out by radical terrorists. On that morning heroes stood up in New York Washington DC and aboard United flight 93. Today we honor the brave men and women who lost their lives that day. We must never forget. https://t.co/0ViPxb16FQ
Great evening supporting my good friend and one of the best Mayors in Ohio Jeff Hall of Newark. Make sure you get out and vote November 5th! https://t.co/BQahQquoYA

I hope everyone had an enjoyable Labor Day Weekend! I spent yesterday in Mansfield walking in the Labor Day parade and talking to folks from Richland County. Great way to end the summer! https://t.co/LAE9gCp33J

Great time with the folks at the Morrow County Fair! Talking about my work to lower taxes boost Ohio’s economy and jobs market and cut red tape for small business owners @MorrowGOP https://t.co/c6RGddoA20
Great day to be out at the #HartfordFair! Best of luck to all the @4H & @OhioFFA exhibitors showcasing their hard work this week. https://t.co/caVvDDzdgN

Always great meeting with Morrow County GOP officials Dan Osborne Larry and Brenda Harden and Pat Davies! Thanks to these folks for their continued fight for individual liberty and economic prosperity. Happy 4th of July week everyone 🇺🇸 https://t.co/icr5QKl49u

What a great kickoff to summer! Thanks to the great folks of ⁦@JohnstownOhio⁩ for including me in the Fireman’s Festival Parade and thank you to all the fireman who keep our communities safe! https://t.co/do0sl4gYJl

Honored to participate in this year’s Powell Memorial Day Parade and Greater Powell Veterans Memorial Ceremony to honor those who gave their lives  while defending our freedom. #MemorialDay https://t.co/ZEtVHCrBTp
Thanks to everyone who came out for another great Utica Ice Cream Parade and Festival today! 🍦🍨 https://t.co/U1U8QGpeTZ
Grateful to participate in today’s @NewAlbanyOhio Founders Day Parade and celebrate the rich history of this great city! #newalbanyproud https://t.co/0D0LgKZ8j7
Check out these finalists’ designs for Ohio’s next “I Voted” stickers and cast your vote for your favorite ⬇️🇺🇸🗳 https://t.co/gPD7wWWIbj

At Licking Co’s Lincoln Day Dinner & Marion Co’s Harding Day Dinner I reaffirmed that the US will never be a socialist country. We need pro-business policies good tax incentives and for the govt to stay out of Ohioans’ lives. That’s exactly what I’m fighting for in Washington! https://t.co/asetvRtSEz

Thanks to my friends at ⁦@TEConnectivity⁩ for having breakfast with me this morning. I had the opportunity to tour the Mansfield facility in October and this morning we caught up on the importance of trade and Ohio’s infrastructure to their work. https://t.co/0sNUL8Dstl
Happy St. Patrick’s Day! 🍀 Great time celebrating in Dublin yesterday. https://t.co/ySLumW2SKX

Was honored to introduce Ohio Supreme Court Justice Sharon Kennedy during last night’s Muskingum County Lincoln Day Dinner. Special thank you to the Muskingum County Young Republicans for helping put this event together. Had a great time honoring the legacy of our 16th President! https://t.co/ABrK9Ni270
